CmdLine: set -eux &&     apk add --no-cache bash openjdk8-jre-base python less
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: set -eux &&     TAR="presto-server-${PRESTO_VERSION}.tar.gz" &&     apk add --no-cache curl wget tar &&     if [ "$PRESTO_VERSION" = "latest" ]; then         PRESTO_VERSION=$(./get_presto_versions.sh | head -n1);     fi &&     server_url="https://repo1.maven.org/maven2/com/facebook/presto/presto-server/${PRESTO_VERSION}/presto-server-${PRESTO_VERSION}.tar.gz" &&     cli_url="https://repo1.maven.org/maven2/com/facebook/presto/presto-cli/${PRESTO_VERSION}/presto-cli-${PRESTO_VERSION}-executable.jar" &&     wget -t 10 --retry-connrefused -O "${TAR}" "$server_url" &&     test -s "${TAR}" &&     tar zxf "${TAR}" &&     test -d "presto-server-${PRESTO_VERSION}" &&     rm -fv  "${TAR}" &&     ln -sv "presto-server-${PRESTO_VERSION}" presto &&     wget -t 10 --retry-connrefused "$cli_url" &&     test -s "presto-cli-${PRESTO_VERSION}-executable.jar" &&     chmod +x "presto-cli-${PRESTO_VERSION}-executable.jar" &&     mv -v "presto-cli-${PRESTO_VERSION}-executable.jar" presto/bin/ &&     ln -sv "presto-cli-${PRESTO_VERSION}-executable.jar" presto/bin/presto &&     rm -v get_presto_versions.sh &&     apk del curl tar wget
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: set -eux &&     adduser -D presto &&     mkdir -pv /presto/logs /var/lib/presto &&     chown -R presto /presto/logs /var/lib/presto
Commands.Name: run
